iterations.failure_reason: Rule hit but no new signatures
improvement_suggestions: Instead of relying on rigid sequences of opcodes, focus on identifying a broader, more characteristic sequence of instructions that signifies the bypassed code block. Utilize more liberal wildcards (`??`) within the patterns to allow for variations in operand values and instruction lengths.  Critically, the skip offset needs to be determined dynamically or based on a more reliable indicator than a fixed value. If a debugger log is available, examine the addresses jumped to after the skip to understand the nature of the incorrect jumps and adjust the skip offset accordingly.
